description: Update ``aws support`` command to the latest version
Update ``aws iam`` command to the latest version
Add ``--hive-site`` option to ``aws emr create-cluster`` and ``aws emr install-application`` commands
Add an ``--exact-timestamps`` option to the ``aws s3 sync`` command (`issue 824 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/824>`__)
Fix bug when spaces in the description caused the copy request to fail (`issue botocore 321 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/pull/321>`__)
